SereneWizard Water Resources Engineer, Geospatial Analylst

About SereneWizard Projects

My Expertise

An enthusiastic, team-oriented and adaptive individual with a research experience in the interdisciplinary trifecta of climate-water-agriculture. I have worked towards developing an understanding of the agricultural processes and its climatic determinants by combining the strengths of spatial knowledge, data science and physical modeling. I am highly motivated towards using programming, quantitative approaches, statistics and spatial analysis for developing novel modelling solutions for solving problems.

Featured Projects

Open Source Geospatial Analysis

Various open source tools are available for geospatial analysis that are cross-platform. Various Python APIs have been developed to facilitate the task.
